channel.title: An rscd question
channel.description:
ok so i been using eaasyrsc and having troubles with it(as yall can see my many topics) and was just wondering if the same problems easyrsc has does rscd have too? i know its like the same source but easyrsc has names with spaces error first letter being cut off. really the name with spaces is the biggest bug as i have done updates to easyrsc i have somehow changed the username spaces fix and it doesnt work anymore.
in conclusion is it worth using rscd instead of easyrsc even though im not a pro coder but have knowledge from coding easyrsc?

item.title: An rscd question
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

id be surprised if you can even set up rscdv25 without easyrsc

Read full topic

item.title: An rscd question

item.description:
@Miles1 wrote:

da real hype:

if easyrsc is better coudlnt u just edit the code and add it to rscd?u would prolly have more potential to grow if u used rscd would u not?

I say yes, you have more potential using the RSCD source. EasyRsc isâ€¦ basically to learn

item.title: An rscd question
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

da real hype:

in conclusion is it worth using rscd instead of easyrsc even though im not a pro coder but have knowledge from coding easyrsc?

Nope, because there are a bunch more problems in the RSCDv25 source.

Read full topic
